lead_paragraph: The police arrested Darrell Fuller shortly after nightfall on suspicion of killing a Nassau County police officer and the driver of a car he is said to have used to flee the scene.
snippet: The police arrested Darrell Fuller shortly after nightfall on suspicion of killing a Nassau County police officer and the driver of a car he is said to have used to flee the scene....

byline.original: By WENDY RUDERMAN and J. DAVID GOODMAN
byline.contributor: Christopher Maag and Sarah Maslin Nir contributed reporting.

headline.print_headline: Nassau Police Officer and 2nd Man Are Killed in Rampage at City’s Edge
headline.main: Nassau Police Officer and 2nd Man Are Killed in Rampage at City’s Edge
headline.seo: Nassau Police Officer and 2nd Man Are Killed in Rampage Near City

abstract: Nassau County Police Officer Arthur Lopez and motorist Raymond Facey are shot and killed during traffic stop in Queens, NY; police arrest suspect Darrel Fuller after eight-hour manhunt.
